testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "Hasnaa@example.com" field.............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "Hasnaa@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user could select euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user select Euro.......................................................passed Then Euro Symbol is shown on the products displayed in Home page............passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSlider | user could click on the slider on the home page
testcase.name: user could click on nokia slider on home page

failure.message: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
Given user click on the "2" slider..........................................passed Then user could navigate to nokia page......................................failed
